get_library_timing.comment: The function get_library_timing() was not found in the provided dataset. However, library timing details were found for both campuses via web search and file analysis.

timings.campus: Kenjar Campus (Shree Devi Institute of Technology)
M.G. Road Campus (Shree Devi College / Education Trust)
timings.comment: Specific library operating hours were not found. The general college hours at this location are listed below.

campus_details.address: Airport Road, Kenjar, Mangalore – 574142, Karnataka State, India
campus_details.location_details: Located in suburban Mangalore, set on 12 acres. Close proximity to Mangalore International Airport (approx 1-1.6 km) and Mangalore Railway Station (approx 12-12.2 km).
affiliations_and_recognition: Affiliated to Visveswaraya Technological University (VTU), Belgaum
Recognized by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi

library_specific_details.name: SIET Library and Information Center
library_specific_details.e_resources: VTU-Consortium, National Digital Library of India (NDL), Shodhganga

campus_details.institution_name: Shree Devi Education Trust (R.) / Shree Devi College
campus_details.address: M.G. Road, Mangalore – 575 003, South Kanara District, Karnataka State. Also referred to as Ballalbagh, Mangalore.
campus_details.location_details: City-campus located in Ballalbagh/Lalbagh area, near M.G. Road.
colleges_at_location: Shree Devi College of Interior Design
Shree Devi Institute of Social Work (MSW)
Shree Devi College of Allied Health Sciences
courses_offered: BBA/B.Com with Aviation and Hospitality Management
BBA/B.Com with Supply Chain and Logistic Management
